author: Barry Crook
text:
The City of Aspen is exploring options for the reorganizing its IT Department.  Our goals include:
•   Right-sizing our Staff to meet the current and future needs of the city customers,
•   Assessing the skills that we need to have in-house to best meet the needs of our customers,
•   Developing a staffing strategy that is effective and affordable,
•   Preparing ourselves for emerging technologies and new options for service delivery and support
.
 Please share your experience with us:
•   What advice would you share with those who are planning to reorganize their IT departments and services?
•   How did you approach reorganization?  
•   What best practices did you use to achieve your goals?
•   Did you use professional services to assist you, and can you recommend specific experts?
•   Are there specific case studies and analyses that could help us?
•   What factors were key  to your success?
Thank you,
 Jim Considine -  I.T. Director
Jim.Considine@cityofaspen.com
title: IT Reorganization
